articles.author: Charmaine Jacob, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed as investors await China loan prime rates; New Zealand exits technical recession - CNBC
articles.description: The one-year loan prime rate serves as a benchmark for most corporate and household loans, while the five-year rate serves as a peg for property mortgages.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets were mostly lower on Thursday as China kept its one- and five-year loan prime rates unchanged.
